Dear Urban Design Students,

You can set your selection 
of the Design Studios here. Please indicate three priorities for this 
and rank them. The first one is your favorite.
You have the choice between the following topics.
SPECTRAL NATURES | Habitat Unit | PJ A
INSURGENT DESIGN | Habitat Unit | PJ A
SECTOR-COUPLING LIVING LABS | Habitat Unit | PJ A
HYRDOPOLITICAL (HI)STORIES | CUD | PJ A
D.I.Y. PARADIGM SHIFT | CUD | PJ A
ADLERSHOF SOIL FUTURES | CUE – Chair of Transitioning Urban Ecosystems | PJ A
PRACTICING MATTERS | Landschaftsarchitektur und Freiraumplanung | PJ LA
WARSAW-BERLIN-WORKSHOP 2024 | Stadtplanung und Bestandsentwicklung | PJ SR
TXL-N / URBAN FUTURES ON MILITARY BROWNFIELDS | Labor K | PJ SR

Please finish your selection by April 14, 2024. You can also change 
an already made selection until then. The results will be published on 
ISIS by April 16, 2024. The chairs will be informed accordingly. 
Please understand that we can't fulfill everyone's initial wish, as we 
will distribute evenly among the topics.

Only
 students of the Urban Design programme are allowed to choose 
their Designs Studios on this ISIS-page

. Exchange students choose their 
Design Studios on the ISIS-page for
Master Architektur
students.

The
 allocation to a topic does not correspond to the module registration. 
Information about module registration will be communicated separately by
 the chairs.
Don't forget to save your selection at the end.
